titles.title: Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act of 2021
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require inclusion of the taxpayer's social security number to claim the refundable portion of the child tax credit.
Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act of 2021
This bill requires taxpayers who are claiming the refundable portion of the child tax credit to include their Social Security account number on their tax returns.
